Text.Page: During your talk with the Khiria, Madat goes missing and you stand accused.

Hatishna?

That's nothing but a fable. We are the Khiria! We don't need a chosen one to lead us to victory!

All right, 'chosen one.' The arachnens stalk our camp. Rid us of them and we'll talk.

Treacherous fiend! Instead of earning our trust, you kidnapped Madat! Where is he?

My soldiers will peel your eyes like grapes for this betrayal!"I can find Madat!"

Fine. Return Madat to us, alive, and I may believe you.

Be warned, though; if he's dead or points the finger at you, you'll be food for the arachnens this day.
(A few glittering bits of shell line the inside of the box.)

Gah! That stench! I'd know it anywhere.

We must turn our eyes to the guwangi.
